member.name: T:MindFusion.Diagramming.Export.SvgExporter
member.summary: Creates SVG (Scalable Vector Graphics) files from MindFusion.Diagramming diagrams.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Diagramming.Export.SvgExporter.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the SvgExporter class.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Diagramming.Export.SvgExporter.Export(MindFusion.Diagramming.Diagram,System.String)
member.summary: Creates an SVG file representing the specified MindFusion.Diagramming diagram.
member.param: A reference to the diagram to be exported.
A full path to the .svg file.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Diagramming.Export.SvgExporter.HyperLinkTarget
member.summary: Specify the value of the Target attribute generated for the HyperLink property of items.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Diagramming.Export.SvgExporter.HyperLinkStyle
member.summary: Specifies what kind of hyperlinks should be generated for the HyperLink property of items.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Diagramming.Export.SvgExporter.ExternalImages
member.summary: Specifies whether images displayed by diagram items should be exported to external files.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Diagramming.Export.SvgExporter.GZipCompression
member.summary: Specifies whether to create GZip compressed SVG.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Diagramming.Export.SvgExporter.RenderOptions
member.summary: Gets a RenderOptions instance that provides various settings for configuring the appearance of exported diagrams.
